CBMG 2015

This is material for a two week intensive course on programming and scientific computing I developed and led in summer 2015 for math grad students at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

If you find it useful, please let me know! Iâ€™d love to hear that others have benefited from it beyond just my class. Sadly, the original notebooks have been lost, so only the HTML renderings remain.
